title: No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When using the Photon version, there is a bug where the popup menu does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor. This menu is supposed to allow users to add breakpoints and marks, but it is not functioning as expected.
OB: When I open a Java editor and right-click on the left vertical ruler, no popup menu appears. This menu should allow me to add breakpoints and marks.
EB: When I open a Java editor and right-click on the left vertical ruler, a popup menu should appear. This menu should allow me to add breakpoints and marks.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a Java editor.
2. Right-click on the left vertical ruler.

Expected result:
A popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints and marks.

Actual result:
No popup menu appears.
